titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the concurrent resolution (H. Con. Res. 83) establishing the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2002, revising the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 2001, and setting forth appropriate budgetary levels for each of fiscal years 2003 through 2011.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-61, by Mr. Goss.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H. Con. Res. 83 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 23.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 136.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 218 - 208 (Roll no. 103).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/8/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H. Con. Res. 83 (FY 2002 congressional budget).
